name: HexaScope
description: HexaScope is a unique oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the prestigious WebtrES club. With its forest green box body, soldier buttons, cat arms and legs, and a screen resembling a snake, HexaScope is a marvel of both design and functionality. It combines the precision and reliability of a traditional oscilloscope with the agility and versatility of a feline. This remarkable robot is ready to explore the digital world and unravel the mysteries of technology.
